message.body: Jordan's mom friended me
Ugh Its Jordan. I'm with will. Mother. = crazy
She just messaged me asking where he was. This is will again
Hey. Did you see the movie? And I'm not gonna accept or reject it
We did. Yeah don't
It was alright. Don't do it. I'm still friends with my ex girlfriends sister. Awks
Same here! Yay us
How was it. Like I feel bad rejecting it but I'm not gonna accept it
Yeah that is awkward. Cus unfriending them shows you made the effort to
How great was that?
It was amazing obvi. How was your night yesterday?
Didnt you get all the horny details from Jordan? And also did u get an iPhone? And we had a great time together as we always do
I did but I wanted to hear it from you too. Yes I did! Im finally a cool kid and can play games with you
Ahhhhh this is so exciting congratulations! But yeah he's pretty great and I kinda have a crush on him so ya know....
He's also kinda weird
He's the weirdest person I know
I wouldn't go that far. He threatened to wear flip flops to prom
He would. I think it's cute and endearing. And I'm no less weird than he is. But still he's a crazyface
Ugh you can't let him though. He's gonna look so good in a tux and the flipflops would ruin everything. He's such a romantic
Flip flops have gotta go. Operation douchebag removal
And maybe he will shave with shaving cream. Ah well. I feel like he's more romantic than sexual. Do you get what I'm saying?
Yeah I know exactly what you're saying. Some people are just not sexual beings. You're dating one of them
Yeah it's true. And I love our relationship. But there's a certain lack of excitement
Isn't your whole thing based on the fact that you are old people? Old people are boring and lack excitement. It's natural
Wait who will play games on my phone now? And no it's not. That's one of many aspects.
Ok good cuz that's the only part I know about. You'll just have to play your own games!
Whaa no I can't. And yeah no multiple things brought us together gosh
I'll just play myself from both of our phones. Well that's good. The whole old person thing is a feeble basis for a relationship
I need pictures on my phone of interesting things. These preset photos that come with the iPhone are boooring
Gosh who do you take me for. Is that what he told you? That's terrible. I like Jordan for so many reasons. The fact that we are both secretly old is an added benefit.
Ok well that's great! I just don't really pry into the more intimate details of your relationship that's all
I feel sometimes like you're the third person in my relationship
￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼This should help
Love you too
Yeah I know. I try to respect boundaries though.
LOVE YOU
I can finally see those emoticons!
So exciting huh. So black or white iPhone (please tell me black) and do you have a snazzy case
Black obvi. My case is fine. It's black and rubbery. Just to protect from cracks and shit
Hot stuff. Yeah I gotchu
How was your ap
I haven't taken it yet. It starts at 12
GOOD LUCK
Thnx
Don't PSYCH yourself out!
Stop being so cool. I can't handle it.
Can't stop won't stop
Add me on find friends
How
Gimme your email and I'll add u
Did you ever get in trouble for changing that line in grease?
Nope
I forgot to wish you good luck on your exam! How was it
Thanks and it went well I think
Tell me da story about getting asked to prom today!
Oh that didn't actually happen lolol. A friend of mine told me that another friend of mine told them that she wanted to ask me to prom and they told her I already had a date
Oh that's less exciting
Yep. It was just super awks
Sounds like it
How was your day with jojo
Awesome. I kinda love that kid.
Eww cooties
Das cute tho :3
We are pretty cute. Where do you think he should go?
I think he should go to bard. But I think both schools are awesome. I don't care which one he chooses. I just want him to make the decision so we can move forward. He really can't go wrong
Exactly. Like that's what I've told him too. Hell do really well wherever he goes and be happy
Yeah. When I tried to tell him that it wasn't helping him so he disregarded it. I don't think I was that helpful
Yeah. We just have to wait for him to figure it out and move forward
I agree with both of those statements.
He's crazy but I love him so much
Do you love him or do you lo0o0o0o0ove him
Like, they're pretty self explanatory
I love you vs I am in love with you
Can you define both of those for me?
Like what's the difference. Is it like love vs in love?
Yes that's what I just said

Well I got that text after doofus. And I love him. I'm not infatuated with him. I'm crazy about him but in a deeper way. Like I could go into all of it but it might be too many cooties for you to handle
Me too. It makes me feel very adult in a way.
Def too many cooties for my taste. But I'm actually really glad that your relationship is so mature
It should. Side note: party on an abandoned beach wooooooooo!
Neither sketchy nor awkward
With Abdullah! Even better!
Not if dullah is there. Omg annelaure didn't recognize Nelson with his shaved head! LOL
Lmao that's so funny. I guess it makes it easier to avoid him that way
Yes I suppose so. Ah she's so crazy. And so is he! They should date. Also everyone at my table separately noticed that wock sat right next to u
Hahaha wock is actually really cool. She def wants the D tho. Annelaure and Nelson are different kinds of crazy lmfao
